    \PY{c+c1}{\PYZsh{}norm of u,v}
    \PY{n}{nu} \PY{o}{=} \PY{n}{np}\PY{o}{.}\PY{n}{linalg}\PY{o}{.}\PY{n}{norm}\PY{p}{(}\PY{n}{u}\PY{p}{)}

    \PY{n}{theta} \PY{o}{=} \PY{n}{np}\PY{o}{.}\PY{n}{arccos}\PY{p}{(}\PY{n}{xdoty}\PY{o}{/}\PY{n}{nudotnv}\PY{p}{)}
    
    \PY{c+c1}{\PYZsh{}and then return the new symmetrized coordinates Mx,My,theta}

\PY{k}{def} \PY{n+nf}{desymmetrize3p}\PY{p}{(}\PY{n}{symm\PYZus{}coords}\PY{p}{)}\PY{p}{:}
